title: Idris Elba to star in airplane hijacking limited series for Apple TV+
content:
Apple TV+ announced today its first project featuring Idris Elba, following the signing of a first look deal in 2020.

more…

The post Idris Elba to star in airplane hijacking limited series for Apple TV+ appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple TV+ announced today its first project featuring Idris Elba, following the signing of a first look deal in 2020. Elba will produce and star in the limited series ‘Hijack’, which will be told in real time as the hijacked airplane flight heads towards London. Elba will play a negotiator called Sam Nelson, who attempts […]
